headlines.description: AS Roma lost third place in Serie A when they slumped to a 2-0 defeat at Parma on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Roma knocked out of third place with defeat at Parma

headlines.description: Juventus stayed top of Serie A with a 1-0 win over AC Milan on Sunday after Cristiano Ronaldo was substituted for the second game in a row and walke
headlines.shortLinkText: Dybala replaces Ronaldo, helps Juve down Milan
